short_summary: Purchase a Particle size Analyzer to replace an aging instrument to investigate the size distribution and shape parameters of a wide range of particle mixtures.
description: The CanmetMINING laboratories require a new particle size analyzer to improve the analysis and range of analysis available by replacing the existing aging instrument. This instrument is required to analyze both the size distributions and shape parameters of experimental reactants and their products. The instrument is used to perform multiple analyses for multiple groups within CAnmetMINING and to fill requests from outside the organization.

full_summary:
### Particle Size Analyzer Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS4576962399
**Modification Number:** 0
**Solicitation Number:** WS4576962399

**Publication Date:** 2024-05-22
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-07T14:00:00 (Note: Amendment to closing time, all supporting documentation and statements of capabilities must be submitted by 14:00 EDT on 2024-06-07)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-19

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice
**Procurement Method:** Advance contract award notice

*Laboratory and scientific equipment* are required by the CanmetMINING laboratories of National Resources Canada (NRCan). The purpose of this tender announcement is to acquire a new particle size analyzer to replace an aging instrument for the investigation of size distribution and shape parameters of particle mixtures.

**End User Entities:**
- Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

**Contracting Entity:**
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**
- Yessica Karnali (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Phone: Not provided
- Fax: Not provided
- Address: Not provided

**Tender Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19785699?extsite=MTk3ODU2OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
**Attachments:** None

**Important Note:**

- All bidders must submit their required supporting documentation and statements of capabilities by 14:00 EDT on 2024-06-07.
- Bids submitted after 14:00 EDT on 2024-06-07 will be considered non-responsive.

The requested equipment will be used to analyze both the size distributions and shape parameters of experimental reactants and their products. This instrument is also used to fulfill requests from outside CanmetMINING, such as Health Canada and Non-Governmental Organizations. The procurement process is subject to the *Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement*, *Canadian Free Trade Agreement*, *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement*, *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement*, *Canada-Chile Free
